description: Defines a data model class for cart items in a shopping cart context, including JSON serialization and copying.

classes.name: CartItem
classes.description: Represents an item in the shopping cart with properties for book ID and quantity, supporting JSON serialization and copying.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the CartItem with optional new bookId and quantity values.

methods.name: fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor that creates a CartItem instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: toJson
methods.description: Converts the CartItem into a JSON map.
